actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to require that the President's report to the Congress with respect to the use of funds by the Central Intelligence Agency for any nonintelligence gathering operation in a foreign country be made in writing prior to the commencement of such operation.

summary.text: Requires, under the Foreign Assistance Act, that the President's report to the Congress with respect to the use of funds by the Central Intelligence Agency for any nonintelligence gathering operation in a foreign country be made in writing prior to the commencement of such operation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to require that the President's report to the Congress with respect to the use of funds by the Central Intelligence Agency for any nonintelligence gathering operation in a foreign country be made in writing prior to the commencement of such operation.
